snippet.title: Why Do Leaves Change Color in the Fall?
snippet.description: Most people enjoy the beautiful show of colors as the leaves change each autumn. Many wonder how and why this happens. To answer that, first we have to understand what leaves are and what they do. Also includes information on how plants prepare for winter. Features a very brief easy-reader section on changing fall leaves, a word scramble activity, and 3 leaf-color science experiments.
